title: unesco_heritage_Kilimanjaro_National_Park
text:
Name: Kilimanjaro National Park. short_description:

At 5,895 m, Kilimanjaro is the highest point in Africa. This volcanic massif stands in splendid isolation above the surrounding plains, with its snowy peak looming over the savannah. The mountain is encircled by mountain forest. Numerous mammals, many of them endangered species, live in the park.

. date_inscribed: 1987. danger: 0. date_end: . longitude: 37.36667. latitude: -3.06667. area_hectares: 75575. category_long: Natural. category_short: N. Country name: United Republic of Tanzania. Region: Africa. iso_code: tz. transboundary: 0. rev_bis: .
